mdRecord.dcterms:title: Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru of the Dominion of India and Family on the East Lawn at Mount Vernon, October 12, 1949
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru of the Dominion of India and his family on the east lawn at Mount Vernon with Congresswoman and Vice Regent for Ohio Frances Payne Bolton. Left to right: Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru, Indira Nehru, Congresswoman and Vice Regent for Ohio Frances Payne Bolton, and Kamala Nehru.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Mansion
East Lawn
Mount Vernon Ladies' Association
